projects: [{"title":"Application of Differential Equation in Option Pricing","start_date":"Sep 2018","end_date":"Dec 2018","description":"A review and detailed research on various models with all-time advancements in the field of Average Option Pricing.Simulation, comparison and Analysis of Asian option pricing models"},{"title":"Designing Rainwater Harvesting System using GIS and GA","start_date":"Sep 2018","end_date":"Dec 2018","description":"Proposed a solution for cost optimization of laying pipes for rainwater collection system through satellite images.Path obtained from images containing storage-tanks and number of junctions with their position is optimized using genetic algorithm."},{"title":"Cryptocurrency","start_date":"Jan 2018","end_date":"May 2018","description":"Portfolio Management in Cryptocurrency"},{"title":"Application of Fuzzy Logic in Computer Engineering","start_date":"Sep 2017","end_date":"Dec 2017","description":"Application of Fuzzy Logic in Washing Machines and Air Conditioner.Introduction of Fuzzy Controllers for variable dirt type and dirt degree in Washing Machines and variable temperature in Air Conditioner with a feedback mechanism."},{"title":"ANANT- CubeSat","start_date":"Oct 2014","end_date":"Dec 2016","description":"Implemented kernel on a FPGA for a cube satellite. Implemented operating system on a radiation hardened board using advanced C++ language"}]
